summary: This bill, H.R. 5630, amends the Public Health Service Act regarding State plans for Substance Use Prevention, Treatment, and Recovery Services block grants. It mandates that State plans include detailed information on medication-assisted treatment (MAT), including available drugs, programs for diversion and misuse prevention, data on misuse of MAT drugs (including mixing with other prescriptions), and drug screening protocols within the State's system of care, particularly for patients receiving MAT.
